atbat.des: Chris Snyder strikes out swinging.
atbat.des_es: Chris Snyder se poncha tirándole.

pitch.cc: Dangerous count for Jon Niese; Chris Snyder is a dead-red fastball hitter, with a .911 OPS against them this season and .741 against everything else.
Jon Niese is trying to tie up Chris Snyder with fastballs inside; Snyder is hitting .321 on pitches in that location compared to .224 overall.
